title: El Viento
subtitle: The Wind
meta_desc: Learn about wind in Spanish (viento, soplar, cometa, hojas) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish weather, el viento Spanish, wind in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: El Viento
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. Wind blowing through trees with leaves swirling in the air.

pages.title: El viento sopla.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. Swirling wind visible through bending grass and floating dandelion seeds.

pages.title: El viento mueve las hojas.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. Colorful leaves being blown by the wind across a park.

pages.title: Vuelo mi cometa.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child flying a colorful kite high in the windy sky.

pages.title: El viento es fresco.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child with hair blowing in a refreshing breeze on a hill.

pages.title: El viento hace sonidos.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. Wind chimes tinkling in the breeze, musical notes floating.
